Posts.Content: May 8, 2008 11:09AM fransavin wrote: I too was diagnose with Lupus almost 30 years ago and Crohns 29 years ago- very unusual combination. I had a thyroid condition when I was a youngster for over 20 years- not too sure the name of it- both parents are dead. The definition of autoimmune disease is when the process in which the body's immune system causes illness by mistakenly attacking healthy cells- so cancer by definition can be consider an autoimmune disease because it attacks healthy cells just diagnose 3 months ago with dcis in the left breast- non invasive-multifocal with nuclear grade 3- had mastectomy after having 2 biopsies and no clear margins-
Posts.Title: How many with BC and autoimmune diseases like LUPUS, RA, ? badboob67 wintersocks
